title: Ticket #5148: Test improvement notes
description:
These are notes of things Alan ran into, but hasn't had time to look deeper into, even to just reproduce them. Ideally Alan would try to reproduce them, then submit better tickets.

  • When launching condor_master, if it just fails to launch (such that exec() fails), it still takes a few seconds to notice. Should notice and return failure immediately. Way to test: remove execute bit from condor_master. (I ran into this when I replaced condor_master with a wrapper to valgrind+condor_master and forgot to set the permissions.)
  • There appear to be a few "sleep(2)" and "sleep(5)"s scattered about. Ideally spin loop with sleep(0) for 2/5 seconds checking too see if the thing you're interested in has happened and failing if you run out of time. This should speed up a bunch of tests by removing a lot of little delays.
